Sql.query: select r.*, p.perinombre from trn_recalculo r left join trn_periodo p on r.pericodi = p.pericodi where r.pericodi = :pericodi and r.recacodi = :recacodi

insert into trn_recalculo ( pericodi, recacodi, recafechavalorizacion, recafechalimite, recahoralimite, recafechaobservacion, recaestado, recanombre, recadescripcion, recanroinforme, recamasinfo, recausername, recafecins, pericodidestino, recacuadro1, recacuadro2, recanota2, recacuadro3, recacuadro4, recacuadro5 ) values ( :pericodi, :recacodi, :recafechavalorizacion, :recafechalimite, :recahoralimite, :recafechaobservacion, :recaestado, :recanombre, :recadescripcion, :recanroinforme, :recamasinfo, :recausername, :recafecins, :pericodidestino, :recacuadro1, :recacuadro2, :recanota2, :recacuadro3, :recacuadro4, :recacuadro5 )

update trn_recalculo set recafechavalorizacion = :recafechavalorizacion, recafechalimite = :recafechalimite, recahoralimite = :recahoralimite, recafechaobservacion = :recafechaobservacion, recaestado = :recaestado, recanombre = :recanombre, recadescripcion = :recadescripcion, recanroinforme = :recanroinforme, recamasinfo = :recamasinfo, recafecact = :recafecact, pericodidestino = :pericodidestino, recacuadro1 = :recacuadro1, recacuadro2 = :recacuadro2, recanota2 = :recanota2, recacuadro3 = :recacuadro3, recacuadro4 = :recacuadro4, recacuadro5 = :recacuadro5 where recacodi = :recacodi and pericodi =:pericodi
delete from trn_recalculo where pericodi =:pericodi and recacodi = :recacodi
select r.*, p.perinombre from trn_recalculo r left join trn_periodo p on r.pericodidestino = p.pericodi Where r.pericodi = :pericodi order by r.recacodi desc

select r.*, p.perinombre from trn_recalculo r left join trn_periodo p on r.pericodidestino = p.pericodi Where r.pericodi = ( SELECT pericodi FROM trn_periodo WHERE perianio = :perianio AND perimes = :perimes ) and UPPER(recaestado) = 'CERRADO' order by r.recacodi desc

select r.*, (select p.perinombre from trn_periodo p where p.pericodi = r.pericodi) as perinombre from trn_recalculo r where r.pericodidestino = (select a.pericodi from trn_periodo a where a.perianio = :perianio and a.perimes = :perimes) and r.recacodi > 1 and r.recaestado = 'Cerrado' order by r.pericodi desc

select r.*, p.perinombre from trn_recalculo r left join trn_periodo p on r.pericodidestino = p.pericodi Where r.pericodi = :pericodi and r.recaestado in ('Publicar', 'Cerrado') order by r.recacodi desc
select * from trn_recalculo where (recanombre like '%' + :recanombre + '%' or :recanombre is null)
select nvl(max(recacodi), 0) + 1 from trn_recalculo where pericodi = :pericodi
select max(recacodi) as recacodi from trn_recalculo where pericodi=:pericodi
select nvl(max(version), 0) as version from dtr_mesval where mes = :pericodi

select r.recacodi, r.recanombre from trn_trans_entrega te left join trn_recalculo r on r.pericodi=te.pericodi and r.recacodi = te.tentversion where te.pericodi = :pericodi and te.emprcodi = :recacodi group by r.recacodi, r.recanombre union select r.recacodi, r.recanombre from trn_trans_retiro tr left join trn_recalculo r on r.pericodi=tr.pericodi and r.recacodi = tr.tretversion where tr.pericodi = :pericodi and tr.genemprcodi = :recacodi group by r.recacodi, r.recanombre order by 1 desc
select pericodi, max(recacodi) as recacodi from trn_recalculo where pericodi > 5 and recacodi > 1 group by pericodi order by pericodi
